simulation

Class VRepHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulation.VRepHelper

  • public class VRepHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used with V-Rep simulator for map a maze and navigate in it
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    acadiou

      • VRepHelper

        public VRepHelper(int port)
        Constructor of VRepHelper
        Parameters:

      • getVrep

      • getClientId

        public int getClientId()
        Get the client id used for exchange data with V-Rep simulator
        Returns:
        clientId

      • getSensors

        public boolean[] getSensors()
        Get the state of 8 IR sensors on the E-Puck robot
        Returns:
        sensors Array of bool. Index 0 = sensor 1 (left). Index 7 = sensor 8 (left below)

      • getOrientation

        public Orientation getOrientation()
        Get the actual orientation of the E-Puck robot
        Returns:
        orientation Object with the orientation of robot

        Set the actual orientation of the E-Puck robot

        Get the actual position of the E-Puck robot in the maze (x,y)
        Returns:

        public void setCoordinate(Coordinate coordinate)
        Set the actual position of the E-Puck robot
        Parameters:
        coordinate - Object with the coordinates of the robot

      • startSimulation

        public void startSimulation()
                     throws VRepException
        Start the simulation in V-Rep simulator (like "play" button)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        VRepException

      • stopSimulation

        public void stopSimulation()
        Stop the simulation in V-Rep simulator (like "stop" button)

      • move

        public void move(int distance,
                 int velocity,
                 boolean saveWay)
        Linear motion of the E-Puck robot Function 1 on V-Rep Lua code
        Parameters:
        distance - Travel distance (in cm)
        velocity - Angular speed
        saveWay - True = save the way into the map (used for map the maze). False = just move without mapping (used for go to a point when the map is known).

      • turnLeft

        public void turnLeft(int velocity)
        Turn the E-Puck robot to the left (90°) Function 2 on V-Rep Lua code
        Parameters:
        velocity - Angular speed (ratio of 1/10 to the speed of the move function)

      • turnRight

        public void turnRight(int velocity)
        Turn the E-Puck robot to the rigth (90°) Function 3 on V-Rep Lua code
        Parameters:
        velocity - Angular speed (ratio of 1/10 to the speed of the move function)

      • uTurn

        public void uTurn(int velocity)
        Half turn the E-Puck robot to the left (180°) Function 4 on V-Rep Lua code
        Parameters:
        velocity - Angular speed (ratio of 1/10 to the speed of the move function)

      • refrechSensorsWithSettings

        private void refrechSensorsWithSettings(int operationMode)
        Ge the state of sensors of E-Puck robot
        Parameters:
        operationMode - The type of query (opMode in V-Rep)

      • refreshSensors

        public void refreshSensors()
        Get the state of sensors of E-Puck robot

      • isFrontObstacle

        public boolean isFrontObstacle()
        Know if there is an obstacle in front of E-Puck robot
        Returns:
        True if an obstacle is detected on sensor 3 or 4

      • isRightObstacle

        public boolean isRightObstacle()
        Know if there is an obstacle in rigth of E-Puck robot
        Returns:
        True if an obstacle is detected on sensor 6

      • isLeftObstacle

        public boolean isLeftObstacle()
        Know if there is an obstacle in left of E-Puck robot
        Returns:
        True if an obstacle is detected on sensor 1

      • sensorsToString

        public java.lang.String sensorsToString()
        Get the state of sensors left, front and right
        Returns:
        String : "| left | front | right |", with detection = 1 and no detection = 0

      • goTo

        public void goTo(Coordinate end,
                 int distance,
                 int vMove,
                 int vTurn)
          throws VRepException
        Go from the current point to another point
        Parameters:
        end - Destination
        distance - Distance on each cell of maze
        vMove - Velocity of moves
        vTurn - velocity of turns (ratio of 1/10 to the speed of the move function)
        Throws:
        VRepException - The destination (end) does not exist

      • treeToString

        public java.lang.String treeToString()
        Get the XML tree (mapping of the maze)
